title: Monkfish with curried lentils
description: The delicate flavour of monkfish is paired with warming curried lentils in this simple dish.
ingredients: 2cm/1in piece fresh root ginger, peeled, grated
200g/7¼oz Puy lentils, cooked according to packet instructions
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander, to serve
